fear, reverence, honour, e.g. parents Le 19:3 (H), Moses and Joshua Jos 4:14, Jos 4:14, the oath 1Sa 14:26, Ec 9:2, commandment Pr 13:13, the sanctuary Le 19:30, Le 26:2 (H), other gods Ju Jdg 6:10, 2Ki 17:7, 2Ki 17:35, 2Ki 17:37, 2Ki 17:38; elsewhere of God:

definitions.body: as attribute of God, [[לְמַעַן תִּוׇּרֵא]] that thou mightest be revered Ps 130:4; [[גׇּדוֹל]]([[ה]]) [[נוֹרָא]]([[ה]])[[ו]] (the) great and awful (God) De 7:21, De 10:17, Ne 1:5, Ne 4:8, Ne 9:32, Da 9:4; with [[עַל]], above all gods Ps 96:4 = 1Ch 16:25; above the angels round about him Ps 89:8.
